title: Skill model
description: Implement `app/models/skill.py` with Skill model. Columns: id (String(26) PK), name (String(100) unique), slug (String(100) unique indexed), category (Enum(SkillCategory)). Use ULIDMixin for id. Model should inherit from Base and mixins.
acceptance_criteria:
- `app/models/skill.py` exports Skill model
- All columns defined with correct types
- name and slug have unique constraints
- slug has index
- category uses SkillCategory enum
